_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.8+pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.11^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.15^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.3.2^where_before_or_: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
